author: Jinese Yockman
comment: 10/17 Still wonderful ty. If u have this app,  u most likely have the box thru the energy Co,  THEY have the ability to change the temp based on saving energy.  So again,  ITS NOT THE APP!!!   Do ur homework people..      9/16 TIP, take app off auto update,ONLY update app whn u learn it's stable & working prop.Ignore otherwise.      4/2/16/I STLL love, enjoy & use this app EVRY SNGLE DAY! It's not 'Flwless' but the smll, kinks get workd out qckly. It wrks 99% of the time, thts good for me.        (1st REVIEW 2014) Omg I love this app! Tysm Devs. I use this daily, and also have schedules set for auto on-off days. I have so many house guests ask me abt this app. So far Zero issues tysm.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving an updated review and very glad to hear you are still enjoying the app! We appreciate your ongoing support and understanding of what the app is doing vs. the utility company and helping to educate others.

author: Amanda Alexander
comment: I like that I can control my system from anywhere, however I can't use the template manager nor can I set my system to respond to weekend/weekday temp. variations. It only allows me to update for one temp at the same time daily. I have considered paid app, but am worried if the product won't work how it should in the first place.

author: Jan Munro
comment: The unavailability for several days every time the app updates is getting old.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review!

author: Las Vegas Home Loans
comment: It's Great,  I have control from anywhere

author: john tubbs jr
comment: You put your temp on 73and it winds up at 77 77smh

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review. Please note that what you describe is  due to the EcoFactor system and not due to the app. Our override feature will enable you to force the setting to your temperature set point.

comment: Pleasure to use.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review and glad you are enjoying the app!

comment: My dogs love it. I think they know I'll keep them comfortable even when I'm not at home. Great tool!!!

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review and very glad to hear you are enjoying the app!

author: Alice Wieland
comment: Very good... Could only get better if it worked with Alexa or Siri

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review and glad you are enjoying the app! Integration with Alexa/Siri is only possible by EcoFactor themselves unfortunately but thank you for the suggestion.

author: Wesley Hayes
comment: Great customer service when app stopped working. They fixed it that day.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review and reaching out to us about the problem! It allowed us to get a fix out quickly for everyone!

comment: Does everything I want it to do.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review and glad to hear you are liking the app!

comment: Very convenient. As long as the cable and wireless is working it is great.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review and glad to see you are enjoying the app!

comment: One update and it's totally broken. Nothing but loading.  Edit: stop refuses to finish loading properly. It simply displays the loading icon (circle) for up to 5+ minutes

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review but you have not contacted us so that we can help. Other users are not experiencing problems.

title: Completely broken

author: John Kennedy
comment: Helps us adjust our Nevada Energy Supplied Thermostats to save us $$$ on Electric in the Summer and Gas in the Winter in a Big Way!

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review and glad that the app is working well and helping you save money!

title: Very Dependable App

author: marc quinonez
comment: Plugging in and unplugging this little white box all day. Still nothing working.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review. If you are having issues with the white Digi box you need to contact your utility company directly as we have no control over that.

title: Not working

author: Peter Abigail
comment: Temperatures are not able to be displayed in C otherwise excellent.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review! EcoFactor does not have an SI unit that we are aware of and given most installations are in the US, we have not added Celsius support. Were you perhaps intending to use/review our ecobee app?

title: Not SI unit friendly

author: Ed Schwartz
comment: I love this app.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review and glad to hear you are enjoying the app!

author: angel fyre
comment: Have not been able to sign in for almost three days. I know you have replied to this in 2014 can you please just reply here so we dont have to search. Thank you.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: We had put up an outage notification via the app. EcoFactor forgot to renew their web site domain and therefore all services were unavailable. Unfortunately we have no control over that. The app should be working for you now.

title: Disappointed

author: Desi Harmon
comment: Updated and havent been able to login for three days

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: We had put up an outage notification via the app. EcoFactor forgot to renew their web site domain and therefore all services were unavailable 9/16-9/19. Unfortunately we have no control over that. The app should be working for you now.

title: App is horrible

author: Amr Mubarak
comment: It is working now. Thanks for the prompt response.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: EcoFactor has had a website outage from 9/16 - 9/19 as their domain name expired. Unfortunately we have no control over that. The app should be working for you now.

title: Update

author: lorena llamas
comment: After new update today, I can't log in or see anything. It stays in refresh mode.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Unfortunately, EcoFactor had another one of their outages last night. Looks like that has resolved itself now. Please let us know if that is not the case.

author: Nicole Reeder
comment: Im a new user. It doesn't have a option for me to create a account.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: The app cannot create an account for you as that needs to have been setup by EcoFactor. Please go to my.ecofactor.com to verify your account and if one has not been created, you will need to contact your utility company.

title: Can't log in

author: Jessica Bruce
comment: Updated the app now I can't log in and sync my AC 😕

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Unfortunately, EcoFactor had another one of their outages last night. Looks like that has resolved itself now. Please let us know if that is not the case.

title: Can't log in

author: Nick P
comment: Works great

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review!

title: 5 Star

author: Reginald Johnson
comment: Great product, no issues . . .

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review and great to hear you aren't having issues and like the app!

title: Works Great

author: Robert Vollowitz
comment: Sometimes it works and much of the time it doesn't.  The interface is good and the features are fine, but if it doesn't connect, it is worthless.  Update 7/28.  The update provided about 4 days ago seems to have solved my connection problem so I've raised my rating to 4.  If it holds, I'll probably give it a 5.  I would like the option of not overriding an energy event but still control the raising of temps at all other times.  We did get these thermostats free for this reason, after all.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review! Can you please send more information to support@supremevue.com as we aren't seeing connection issues from other users.

author: arthure80
comment: Consistently does not change temp remotely.  Hangs, probably the reason for constant updates.  Summer in Vegas and I can't use this app to adjust my temp.  What else could be worse....  continues to be sheeeeeeet!!

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for your review! The app has always had ads unless you purchase the app. EcoFactor has had multiple issues during the summer with their servers which has been consistent for the past several years and unfortunately we can't control that.

title: Never works since added ads.

author: Margo Nelson
comment: Keeps showing on the home page of my cell phone.  It will not go away.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review, but we are not sure what you are referring to unless you are using the widget which would also not display an error message on your home screen. Most likely a different app is causing this issue.

title: Error message

author: Meghan Schwartz
comment: I log into the app and I am unable to view or update any of my info. Always seems to have issues.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review! Please contact us at support@supremevue.com so we can help you with your issue.

title: Never seems to work

author: Sean Duncan
comment: User friendly and more options than the NV Energy app.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review and glad you find our app to be better than NV Energy's!

title: Way better than NV Enegy

author: Erica Duheaney
comment: I should be able to set my own temp. Its still 85 degrees. I have a newborn in the house n its not comfortable. The point of this app is to remote into the thermostat to "my" liking...ughhh. If I don't want to participate in the events, it should be by my choice. Not to mention I just bought the app to override and it has not budged😝

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review. Unfortunately the adjustments are a part of the EcoFactor service. The override feature in the app should force a reset back to your schedule but this is only available if you purchase the app. If you have and are still having issues, please contact us.

title: Settings

author: Heather Ali
comment: I cannot actually save a program because the servers always have errors. I am 9 months pregnant and getting to set the thermostat to 75 from 82 is getting ridiculous.

reply.author: SupremeVue
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review. Sorry to hear the EcoFactor servers are giving you constant errors. We aren't in control of EcoFactor's servers unfortunately and suggest you try using their website to set your schedule instead.
